title: Christmas in Cambridge
description: Fans of Kristen Casey's Second Chances series will love this holiday short story!Characters you know and love from books 1 through 2.5 are converging on the Hughes family estate in England to celebrate the holidays together - and there is definitely something special in the Christmas punch. Prepare to laugh and love all over again as the handsome Hughes men navigate marriage and family life...and get a few more presents than they were expecting.
author: Kristen Casey
